column2: "Are you on your break too? I thought I'd go ahead and take some time off myself. It seems that I've only gotten busier in these times of peace."
"Ah, don't get me wrong, I would never describe a state of emergency as affording plenty of free time. It's simply that more opportunities for public-facing work are presenting themselves."
"I sometimes encounter people wanting to thank me, but it's just not in my nature to be entirely comfortable with that sort of thing."
"After all, if they should be thanking anyone, it should be you. The one who saved us all."
"While this may be a bit belated, please let me thank you as well."
"I couldn't have done it without everyone's power."
"Now there's a surprise."
"Humble as ever. Even so..."
"Hahaha. Ah, sorry. Indeed, I'm quite shocked myself."
"You may take the gratitude I offer however you wish. Even so..."
"Your eyes aren't suited to doubting people. No matter the era, there are always people who elevate heroes like you, who carve their names in history."
"Similarly, there are also those who view such unbridled strength as a threat, and unlike ARKS, seek to persecute them."
"Indeed, the strife between ARKS and Darkers was due to the existence of Photons in the first place."
"It's even possible that we'll start seeing a growing influence of advocate groups which protest against Photon armaments."
"If that happens, the Oracle we know now will be divided. Some day, we may very well face a dreadful conflict such as that in the future."
"Well, it's just a thought of mine. With a presence like yours around, it's one of the possible futures we may encounter."
"I want to tell you to stay wary of people, but..."
"That might be a bit difficult for someone as good-natured as you."
"Well, I thought I would give you the heads-up anyway. After all, our Intelligence Division exists to avoid such conflicts."
"I'll be looking on from the sidelines. I don't intend to be upstaged by your desire to maintain this peace we've gained."
"I've been thinking of how to repay you for protecting all that we hold so dear. Well, I'll be off."
